üéØ Technology Stack

Backend Architecture

  • Framework: Python 3.9+ with FastAPI
  • Architecture Pattern: Clean Architecture + Domain-Driven Design (DDD)
  • Container Orchestration: AWS Fargate for scalable container management
  • API Design: RESTful APIs with OpenAPI documentation

Frontend Architecture

  • Framework: Next.js 14 with React 18
  • Language: TypeScript for type safety
  • Styling: Tailwind CSS + Material-UI components
  • Forms: React Hook Form with Yup validation

Data Architecture

  • Primary Database: PostgreSQL (AWS RDS) with Multi-AZ deployment
  • Caching: ElastiCache Redis for session and application caching
  • Data Lake: S3 for raw data storage and analytics
  • Stream Processing: AWS Kinesis for real-time data ingestion
  • ETL Processing: AWS Glue for data transformation
  • Analytics: Amazon Athena for serverless querying

Security Architecture

  • Authentication: Microsoft Entra ID (internal) + Auth0 (external)
  • Authorization: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) with JWT tokens
  • Data Security: Row Level Security (RLS) in PostgreSQL
  • Network Security: VPC with private subnets, WAF, and Security Groups
  • Encryption: At-rest and in-transit encryption for all data
